markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Innocent Butterfly](/Feats.aspx?ID=2709) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 78</row>

**Archetype** [Butterfly Blade](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=91)

**Prerequisites**
[Butterfly Blade Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2704)

</column>

---

You know how to alter the perceptions of others. You can cast [_aura of the unremarkable_](/Spells.aspx?ID=847) once per day as an innate arcane spell. The spell uses your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
name: Innocent Butterfly
